name: Baby Hazel First Rain
description:
Play Baby Hazel First Rain game for free on iPad device.

Wow! What a fun it is to drench yourself in the first rain showers. Play this game to enjoy the first rain showers of the season along with Baby Hazel. So to do this, you need to dress up Baby Hazel in rainy season’s costumes and accessories. Then take Baby Hazel and her friend to the garden and play with them in the rain. Help them to enjoy every moment. Be ready to explore Hazel’s first rain. Here you GO!!
